channel.title: How do u make it so ppl cant logg in unless a registered username
channel.description: Like I want a server were u don't put some random username and password, because in my folder "characters" its over 5000 ppl, and its alot of memory slowing my computer. So what I want is so only ppl that register (making a regerstering thing like in runescape) and not made up characters that probably isnt going to be use again. If its possible to load from characters but not save new characters then it might help...

item.title: How do u make it so ppl cant logg in unless a registered username
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Reaper Owner Reaper
item.description:
@Owner_Reaper wrote:

Like I want a server were u don’t put some random username and password, because in my folder “characters” its over 5000 ppl, and its alot of memory slowing my computer. So what I want is so only ppl that register (making a regerstering thing like in runescape) and not made up characters that probably isnt going to be use again. If its possible to load from characters but not save new characters then it might help…
